Tunable.name: BLACKLIST_HOUSEHOLD_FILTER
Tunable.description: The filter that should apply to homeless households to ensure we don't get anything included in this filter.

TunableList.name: DESIRED_RENT_BOUNDS
TunableList.description: A mapping of star rating (as an integer) to percentage of max rent, within a range.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The range of star ratings, should be 1-5.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: A tuple containing the lower bound and upper bound of the percentage of max rent for this star rating.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableTuple.name: DESIRED_RENT_MULTIPLIER
TunableTuple.description: A multiplier to change an existing household's desired rent. Template households are tuned on the household template.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifications are applied.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_value.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.

Tunable.name: HOMELESS_HOUSEHOLD_TENANT_FILTER
Tunable.description: The filter that should apply to homeless households to ensure we only get the households we want.

Tunable.name: HOMELESS_HOUSEHOLD_WEIGHT
Tunable.description: The weight that a homeless household will be selected.

TunableList.name: NUMBER_OF_POTENTIAL_HOUSEHOLDS
TunableList.description: A mapping of star rating to a range of number of households that should appear in the list of potential tenant households.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The range of star ratings, should be 1-5.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: The minimum and maximum number of households to be displayed, depending on the star rating.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: PREMADE_HOUSEHOLD_TEMPLATE_WEIGHT
Tunable.description: The weight that a premade household template will be selected.

TunableList.name: PREMADE_TENANT_HOUSEHOLD_TEMPLATES
TunableList.description: A list of all premade Tenant Household Templates that are part of the household generator.

Tunable.description: Individual Tenant Household Templates to randomly pick from.

TunableList.name: RANDOM_TENANT_HOUSEHOLD_TEMPLATES
TunableList.description: A list of all Tenant Household Templates that can appear in the household generator. Used if all premades are already selected.

Tunable.description: Individual Tenant Household Templates to randomly pick from.
